biography.value:
Each pack of shadow mastiff;shadow mastiffs is led by an alpha, the smartest one of the group. The sound of an alpha’s howl strikes terror into those who hear it and is a sure sign that a pack is on the prowl.

Shadow Mastiffs

Shadow mastiffs—hounds of the Shadowfell—move invisibly through the shadows, always on the hunt.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

dr.custom: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks while in Dim Light or Darkness

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: [[/damage 2d6 + @mod type=piercing average=true]] damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a [[/save str 13 format=long]] or be knocked &Reference[prone]{prone}.

The [[lookup @name]] attacks with its [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
The shadow mastiff howls. Any &Reference[beast]{Beast} or &Reference[humanoid]{Humanoid} within 300 feet of it must succeed on a [[/save wis 11 format=long]] or be &Reference[frightened]{frightened} of it for 1 minute. A &Reference[frightened]{frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target’s save is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any shadow mastiff’s Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]] and a save is required.

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Ethereal Awareness. The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
Sunlight Weakness. While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse

description.value:
While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff becomes &Reference[invisible]{invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is &Reference[incapacitated]{incapacitated}.

The [[lookup @name]] uses [[lookup @item.name]].

source.book: Mordenkainen Presents: Monsters of the Multiverse
